info.description: Documentation for the Unmanic application API
info.title: Unmanic API

content.description: Document contents read line-by-line into a list

traceback.description: Attached exception traceback (if developer mode is enabled)
example:
Traceback (most recent call last):
json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 3 column 14 (char 45)

start.description: Start row number to select from

search_value.description: String to filter search results by
search_value.example: items with this text in the value

recordsTotal.description: Total number of records in this table

recordsFiltered.description: Total number of records after filters have been applied

successCount.description: Total count of times with a success status in the results list

failedCount.description: Total count of times with a failed status in the results list

id_list.description: Start row number to select from

success.description: This is always "True" when a request succeeds

update_available.description: Does the plugin have an update available

description.example: Ensure all video streams are encoded with the H264 codec using the h264_nvenc encoder.

recordsTotal.description: Total number of records in this table

recordsFiltered.description: Total number of records after filters have been applied

key_id.description: The config input base64 encoded key (used for linking keys containing spaces, etc.)

key.description: The config input key or name

value.description: The current value of this config input

label.description: The label used to define this config input

select_options.description: Additional options if the input_type is set to 'select'

slider_options.description: Additional options if the input_type is set to 'slider'

display.description: Should the setting input be displayed (visible, hidden)

description.example: Ensure all video streams are encoded with the H264 codec using the h264_nvenc encoder.
